column2: Acorn International, Inc. operates as a marketing and branding company. The company is headquartered in Shanghai, Shanghai and currently employs 142 full-time employees. The Company’s business is comprised of two main divisions, direct-sales platforms and its nationwide distribution network. The direct-sales business involves marketing and selling products directly to consumers in China through its outbound marketing platform and Internet sales platform. In addition, the Company maintains a nationwide distribution network through which it distributes a select number of its products promoted by the direct-sales platform. The Company’s distribution network covers all provinces in China through more than 29 distributors, and allows us to reach over 2,200 retail outlets across China.
